txt.en:
'Hullo there, you're in Frostbluff for the Yule Festival, aren't you? That's splendid! This is my first visit to Winter-home, quaint little village, isn't it? I work for Mr. Shakesburrow...he's the owner of the Green Lilly Inn you know! He's also the director of the G.L.O.B.E.

'What is the G.L.O.B.E.? Of course! I can't be forgetting my manners, expecting everyone to know everything...the G.L.O.B.E. is the Green Lilly Orators, Bards, and Entertainers. Mr. Shakesburrow put together an acting company to amuse his customers, and people liked it so much he's taken it on the road!

'Mr. Shakesburrow has asked me to find folks willing to review the show. There are two Shire-critics who've come along with us...but they've been...well, you'll see for yourself.

'We've got a special showing of 'An Ode to Old Bloodtusk' scheduled for this evening...you won't want to miss it!'

'You saw one of our performances! What did you think of 'An Ode to Old Bloodtusk?'

'Oh, I see. Yes, some of the actors have been having...difficulties. 

'Perhaps you would come back tomorrow, I'm sure we will be back on schedule by then.'
'Have you attended one of the performances yet?'

A hobbit working for the G.L.O.B.E. has asked you to attend a showing of 'An Ode to Old Bloodtusk' and return with your thoughts.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Attend a performance in the Frostbluff Theatre
Attend a performance in the Frostbluff Theatre.
Speak with the hobbit outside the Frostbluff Theatre in Winter-home.\n\nYou should tell the hobbit about the performance you saw.
